author: jgm
content:
FYI the batch validator depositor contract has been audited (thanks to the Ethereum Foundation for sponsoring the audit), available at https://dedaub.com/audits/ethereum-foundation/ef-batch-validator-depositor-april-02-2025/

A new version of the contract post-audit has been deployed to hoodi and mainnet, the addresses of the contract for these networks can be found at https://github.com/attestantio/batch-validator-depositor
